text: @GOPLeader @realDonaldTrump FU #KremlinKevin people are dying by the thousands from #COVID19 and you bastards just focus on money. It was your party that criminalized pot so you could hippies in jail w during the #VietnamWar You also would not allow research to find the health benefits of #cannabis. So FU
